data.title: Safi Darashah cricket: Double ton by Karun Nair
data.meta_description: A double century by Karun Nair (256, 344b, 20x4, 7x6) powered KSCA Secretary’s XI to 479 for nine declared in their first innings against Andhra Cricket Association, who were 12 for no loss when rains forced abandonment in the Safi Darashah All-India cric
data.text:
A double century by Karun Nair (256, 344b, 20x4, 7x6) powered KSCA Secretary’s XI to 479 for nine declared in their first innings against Andhra Cricket Association, who were 12 for no loss when rains forced abandonment in the Safi Darashah All-India cricket tournament here Wednesday.

Vishal Singh (128, 328b, 19x4) of Jharkhand CA, Vineet Saxena (103 batting, 216b, 14x4), Jayadev Shah (147, 144b, 14x4, 6x6) of Saurashtra CA and Rahul Dalal (108, 247b, 13x4) of Haryana CA also notched three-figure scores in the matches played at Bangalore.

Brief scores:

At Bangalore: KSCA XI 527 for 6 in 120 overs (KL Rahul 162, Ganesh Satish 91, Manish Pandey 87 not out, CM Gautam 30, Amit Verma 54, Abhimanyu Mithun 58, Sayyed Baddiuzzamma 5-67) vs Goa CA 153 for 4 in 38 overs (Ravikant Shukla 70 batting, Darshan Misal 36 batting).

Jharkhand CA 298 all out in 111.1 overs (Vishal Singh 128, Vivek Yadav 3-69, Tanveer Ul Haq 3-60) vs Rajasthan CA 228 for 4 in 64 overs (Vineet Saxena 103 batting (216 balls, 14x4), Robin Bist 73, Rahul Shukla 3-48)

KSCA Colts 295 all out in 107.3 overs (KV Siddharth 84, Jayesh Odedara 3-49, Balakrishna Jadeja 2-77, Dharmendra Jadeja 2-48, Sanadhya 2-36) vs Saurashtra CA 323 for 8 in 77overs (Shelden Jackson 64, Jayadev Shah 147, Chirag Pathank 31, Abrar Kazi 2-41, Sanjay Ranjan Kumar 2-30).

Cricket Association of Bengal 359 all out in 113.5 overs (Sudip Chatterjee 39, Sandipan Das 91, Savansekar Monpal 31,Dip Chatterjee 71, Vicky Saha 5-61, Banti Roy 2-61, Vicky Saha 2-47) vs Tripura CA 225 for 6 in 63 overs (Syed Abbas 84, Abhijit Dey 40, Nirupam Choudhay 44 batting, Manjoit Ghosh 3-39, Veer Pratap 2-60).

Orissa Cricket Association: 194 all out in 71.4 overs and 100 for 4 in 30 overs (Harshal Patel 2-26) vs Haryana CA 274 all out in 86.5 overs (Abhimanyu 31, Rahul Dalal 108, Jayant Yadav 71, Alok Mangaraj 4-57, Deepak Beharia 2-46, Jayant Beheria 2-56).

Kerala CA 388 for 8 in 120 overs (AV Jagadeesh 101, Nikhilesh Surendran 93, Rohan Pream 55 not out, Vinoop Manoharan 37, Stalin Hoover 3-97, Ronit More 2-86, SK Moinuddin 2-59) vs KSCA President’s XI 205 for 3 in 59 overs (Desphande 83 batting, KC Avinash 59 batting, Sandeep Warrior 2-31).

At Mysore: KSCA Secretary’s XI 479 for 9 decl in 119 overs (Karun Nair 256, Arjun Hoysala 35, Mir Kaunain Abbas 56, Anirudh Joshi 35, Ajay Kumar D 3-91, Shiva Kumar D 2-56, Swaroop 3-96) vs Andhra CA 12 for no loss in 3 overs.

Assam CA 222 all out in 74.2 overs (Avijit Singha Roy 30, Gokul Sharma 53, Abu Nechim Ahmed 51, Babakhan Pathan 2-51, Hardik Pandya 2-27, Ketual Patel 3-53) vs Baroda CA 126 for 8 in 45.2 overs (Aditya Wadhmode 77 batting, Krishna Das 6-28).
